__e: Even though what he did to Drake...
I felt I had brought that trouble upon Drake and they'd do something worse to him if I did not forget him.
I found out about the drake And the kind of man that dad really was.
The Drake's come a long way since then.
The Drake killed your mother and now wants to kill you?
Sergeant Drake has heard the tale too, I see.
And I know for sure that Drake would not have left me then.
And I think, if she truly love Drake, there's naught that could sway her.
Not here, Cap'n, but I know that way. I could go.
